trans-unit.source: Provides a glyph for an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to display when a user disables an activity at design time.

Activity designers display <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CommentGlyph> when a user sets the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Enabled%2A> property to `false` at design time for the designer or its parent designer.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CommentGlyph"></xref> class.
Returns the bounds for the current comment glyph on the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CommentGlyph.GetBounds%2A> inflates the bounds of `designer` by the value held in <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.Margin%2A> and returns the resultant rectangle.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> with which the comment glyph is associated.
`true` to indicate whether the glyph appears on the activity designer surface; otherwise, `false`.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds for the glyph.
Performs any tasks required to render the comment glyph on the activity designer surface.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to perform fill and drawing tasks.
`true` to indicate that the glyph appears on the design surface; otherwise, `false`.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> to use to access ambient property settings.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> from which to obtain information about user actions.
Gets the view priority of the glyph on the activity designer.
Priority helps determine the order in which the glyph is displayed on the activity designer.
An integer that represents the view priority of the glyph on the activity designer.
